SELECT * FROM (SELECT page.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID AS employeeId, EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS employeeName, GENDER AS gender, ADDRESS AS address, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, HIRE_DATE AS hireDate, CONTACT_NUMBER AS contactNumber, EMAIL AS email, DIVISION_NAME AS divisionName, POSITION_NAME AS positionName, MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS managerName, RE.RESIGN_DATE AS resignDate FROM EMPLOYEES EMP LEFT JOIN DIVISIONS DIV ON DIV.DIVISION_ID = EMP.DIVISION_ID JOIN POSITIONS POS ON POS.POSITION_ID = EMP.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES E ) MANAGER ON MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.HEAD_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, RESIGN_DATE FROM RESIGN_EMPLOYEES )RE ON RE.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE TREE_ID LIKE (SELECT TREE_ID FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID= #empId#)||'%'
UPPER(EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID) LIKE UPPER(#value#)
UPPER(EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP.GENDER) = #value#
UPPER(EMP.EMAIL) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(DIVISION_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(POSITION_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
(CASE WHEN NVL(TO_CHAR(RE.RESIGN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), '0') = '0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = #value#
ORDER BY EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID ASC) page WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) WHERE rnum >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMPLOYEES EMP LEFT JOIN DIVISIONS DIV ON DIV.DIVISION_ID = EMP.DIVISION_ID JOIN POSITIONS POS ON POS.POSITION_ID = EMP.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES E ) MANAGER ON MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.HEAD_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, RESIGN_DATE FROM RESIGN_EMPLOYEES )RE ON RE.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE TREE_ID LIKE (SELECT TREE_ID FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID= #empId#)||'%'
UPPER(EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID) LIKE UPPER(#value#)
UPPER(EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(GENDER) = UPPER(#value#)
UPPER(EMAIL) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(DIVISION_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(POSITION_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
(CASE WHEN NVL(TO_CHAR(RE.RESIGN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), '0') = '0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = #value#

SELECT EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID AS employeeId, EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS employeeName, GENDER AS gender, ( CASE WHEN GENDER = 0 THEN 'Male' WHEN GENDER = 1 THEN 'Female' END ) AS genderName, ADDRESS AS address, BIRTHDATE AS birthdate, HIRE_DATE AS hireDate, CONTACT_NUMBER AS contactNumber, EMAIL AS email, DIV.DIVISION_ID AS divisionId, DIV.DIVISION_NAME AS divisionName, POS.POSITION_ID AS positionId, POS.POSITION_NAME AS positionName, MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_ID AS managerId, MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS managerName, MANAGER.DIVISION_ID AS managerDivisionId, MANAGER.TREE_ID AS managerTreeId, RE.RESIGN_DATE AS resignDate, RE.RESIGN_NOTE AS resignNote, EMP.TREE_ID AS treeId FROM EMPLOYEES EMP LEFT JOIN DIVISIONS DIV ON DIV.DIVISION_ID = EMP.DIVISION_ID JOIN POSITIONS POS ON POS.POSITION_ID = EMP.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME,DIVISION_ID,TREE_ID FROM EMPLOYEES ) MANAGER ON MANAGER.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.HEAD_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, RESIGN_DATE, RESIGN_NOTE FROM RESIGN_EMPLOYEES )RE ON RE.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID=#id#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT page.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT TASK_ID AS taskId, TASK_NAME AS taskName, TASK_DESCRIPTION AS taskDescription, TASK_START_DATE AS taskStartDate, TASK_ESTIMATE_DATE AS taskEstimateDate, TASK_LAST_STATUS AS taskLastStatus, PRO.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS taskAssignerName, EMP2.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS taskReceiverName FROM TASKS TSK JOIN PROJECT_MEMBERS PROM ON TSK.PROJECT_MEMBER_ID = PROM.PROJECT_MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN PROJECTS PRO ON PRO.PROJECT_ID = PROM.PROJECT_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP ON EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = TSK.TASK_ASSIGNER JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP2 ON EMP2.EMPLOYEE_ID = TSK.TASK_RECEIVER WHERE TASK_RECEIVER=#empId# OR TASK_ASSIGNER=#empId#
UPPER(TASK_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(TASK_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
TASK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
TASK_ESTIMATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
ORDER BY TASK_NAME ASC) page WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) WHERE rnum >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TASKS TASK JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP_ASSIGN ON TASK.TASK_ASSIGNER=EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP_RECEIVE ON TASK.TASK_RECEIVER=EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ( SELECT TD.TASK_ID, MAX(TD.TASK_CHANGE_DATE) AS TASK_CHANGE_DATE FROM TASK_DETAILS TD GROUP BY TD.TASK_ID ) TASK_DET ON TASK_DET.TASK_ID=TASK.TASK_ID WHERE TASK_ASSIGNER=#empId# OR TASK_RECEIVER=#empId#
UPPER(TASK_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(TASK_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
TASK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
TASK_ESTIMATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
OR TASK.TASK_ID IN ( SELECT X.TASK_ID FROM TASKS X JOIN EMPLOYEES Y ON Y.EMPLOYEE_ID= X.TASK_ASSIGNER AND Y.EMPLOYEE_ID = X.TASK_RECEIVER WHERE Y.HEAD_ID = #empId#
UPPER(X.TASK_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(X.TASK_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
X.TASK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
X.TASK_ESTIMATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
) OR TASK.TASK_ID IN ( SELECT X.TASK_ID FROM TASKS X JOIN PROJECT_MEMBERS Y ON X.PROJECT_MEMBER_ID = Y.PROJECT_MEMBER_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES Z ON Z.EMPLOYEE_ID=X.TASK_RECEIVER WHERE Z.HEAD_ID = #empId#
UPPER(X.TASK_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(X.TASK_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
X.TASK_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
X.TASK_ESTIMATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#startDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#untilDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
)
